org.joda.time

Class MutablePeriod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joda.time.base.AbstractPeriod
      • org.joda.time.base.BasePeriod
        • org.joda.time.MutablePeriod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, ReadWritablePeriod

    public class MutablePeriod
extends BasePeriod
implements ReadWritablePeriod, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
